backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence data mapping project features to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries of all frontend files for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing SEO metadata and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all portfolio sections with dividers and a themed footer.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling and smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Card component showing a project’s details and optional demo or repo links.
frontend/src/components/SafeExternalLink: Wrapper for secure external links using target="_blank" and noopener noreferrer.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with biography text, highlight cards, and a core competencies list. Uses mapped icon items and structured content blocks.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact options including email, Calendly link, and social profiles using SafeExternalLink and config-driven data.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a hero banner with background imagery, branding, tagline, and buttons that smooth-scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists consulting services with icons, descriptions, and typical engagement items generated from a services array.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Renders client testimonials in a grid, each showing quote details and author information.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorkSec: Displays featured project cards by mapping over project data from the projects file.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Provides contact configuration including email, Calendly URL, and social profile links.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines a Project interface and exports an array of project case studies with descriptions, roles, and links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, CSS variables for the site’s color theme, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, plugins, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s metadata, features, requirements, and image needs for the personal portfolio site.
